title: Slack MFA
name: auth0-slack-mfa
author: auth0
description: This extension gives the ability to add multifactor authentication using Slack.
uninstallConfirmMessage: Do you really want to uninstall this extension?

auth0.scopes: read:clients delete:clients read:rules create:rules update:rules delete:rules

CLIENT_ID.description: The client id used for Slack MFA

CLIENT_SECRET.description: The secret used to sign the JWT's used by this extension.
